title: Sweet Stolen Passion
description: HE WOULD NEVER FORGET HER...Though he'd never forgive Ameran Michol for betraying him with his trusted friend, Lord Grayson Carlisle knew he couldn't forget the rapturous nights of love they'd shared on a moonswept island beach. And now King Charles II himself had ordered the bold naval commander to return to France and bring the deceiving minx back home! Though sworn not to succumb to her bewitching charms a second time, the moment he saw Ameran again Gray knew that their time apart had only deepened his desire. And try as he might to resist the ebony-haired enchantress, he was soon powerless against the passions she rekindled with just one fiery glance!SHE WOULD NEVER FORGIVE HIM...It was cruel enough being branded a witch and banished from England...but to be unjustly accused and abandoned by the man she loved was just too terrible to be borne! And now the audacious scoundrel had come back--with reluctant passion blazing in his eyes. But Ameran had no intention of falling beneath Gray's seductive spell again...until he took her into his arms once more. Ruled by a love she couldn't deny, Ameran sailed back with him across tempestuous seas, vowing that nothing would part them ever again...as together, they defied destiny to surrender heart and soul to the unending ecstasy of their...SWEET STOLEN PASSION.
author: Jolene Prewit-Parker
